fields.title: Phishing Email from Bank
fields.description: I received an email claiming to be from my bank asking for my account details and password. The email looked suspicious with grammatical errors.

fields.title: Unauthorized Access to Email Account
fields.description: Someone has accessed my email account and sent spam messages to all my contacts. I noticed unusual login activity from an unknown location.

fields.title: Online Shopping Fraud
fields.description: I ordered a laptop from an online store and paid Rs. 45,000 but never received the product. The website is now unreachable and the customer service number is disconnected.

fields.update_text: Initial investigation has begun. We have contacted the bank to verify the phishing attempt and are tracking the origin of the email.
We have identified the fraudulent website and its operators. Legal action has been initiated and we are working with payment providers to attempt recovery of funds.
Case resolved. The payment has been refunded to your account. The fraudulent website has been taken down and the operators have been identified for prosecution.
